root.name: Mega Man Soccer
root.description: OverviewA title screen.Taking a break from the traditional Mega Man style gameplay, the appropriately titled Mega Man Soccer features Mega Man and the beloved bosses associated with the series such as Cut Man and Heat Man going head-to-head in the world's most popular sport, with unique power shots assigned to each character.Playable CharactersProto ManMega ManCut Man (Mega Man)Elec Man (Mega Man)Bomb Man (Mega Man)Ice Man (Mega Man)Fire Man (Mega Man)Bubble Man (Mega Man 2)Flash Man (Mega Man 2)Air Man (Mega Man 2)Wood Man (Mega Man 2)Needle Man (Mega Man 3)Top Man (Mega Man 3)Snake Man (Mega Man 3)Gemini Man (Mega Man 3)Skull Man (Mega Man 4)Toad Man (Mega Man 4)Dust Man (Mega Man 4)Pharaoh Man (Mega Man 4)Enker (Mega Man in Dr. Wily's Revenge)

similar_games.game: Shijou Saikyou League Serie A: Ace Striker
